item.title: 中国 11 月消费通胀加快，生产通缩持续
item.description: 周三的官方数据显示，中国11月份的年度消费通胀加速，而生产通缩持续存在，因为政策制定者扩大了抑制产能过剩的行动。【原文：China's annual consumer inflation accelerated in November while producer deflation persisted, official data showed on Wednesday, as policymakers extended their campaign to curb overcapacity.】

item.title: 罗利建筑公司 Cardinal Infrastructure 在美国首次公开募股中筹集约 2.415 亿美元资金
item.description: 建筑服务提供商卡迪纳尔基础设施集团（Cardinal Infrastructure Group）周二表示，该公司在美国首次公开募股中筹集了约 2.415 亿美元。【原文：Construction services provider Cardinal Infrastructure Group said on Tuesday it has raised about $241.5 million in its initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 司法部公布对俄罗斯支持的网络攻击指控的新罪名
item.description: 美国司法部周二公布了对一名乌克兰人的额外联邦刑事指控，该人被控参与网络攻击和其他针对关键基础设施的计算机入侵，以支持俄罗斯的利益。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department on Tuesday unveiled additional federal criminal charges against a Ukrainian national accused of participating in cyberattacks and other computer intrusions against key infrastructure in support of Russian interests.】

item.title: 美联储倒计时，日元疲软，美元持稳
item.description: 日元在隔夜突然暴跌后，在周三显得醉醺醺的，日本与世界其他国家之间的巨大利率差给日元带来了压力，即使人们普遍预期日本央行将在下周收紧政策。【原文：The yen looked punch-drunk on Wednesday after a sudden spill overnight, pressured by wide interest rate differentials between Japan and the rest of the world even as its central bank is widely expected to tighten policy next week.】

item.title: 美国官员称美国与印尼的贸易协议面临破裂风险
item.description: 一位美国官员周二表示，由于雅加达在作为协议一部分所做的几项承诺上出现了反悔，美国与印尼在七月份达成的贸易协议面临着破裂的风险。【原文：A U.S. trade agreement reached with Indonesia in July is at risk of collapsing because Jakarta has backtracked on several commitments it made as part of the deal, a U.S. official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加拿大横贯航空与飞行员工会达成避免罢工的临时协议
item.description: 加拿大休闲航空公司横贯航空（Air Transat）及其飞行员工会周二表示，他们已达成一项临时协议，承诺提高薪酬并改善工作条件，从而避免了可能发生的罢工，使运营恢复正常。【原文：Canadian leisure carrier Air Transat and its pilots' union said on Tuesday they had reached a tentative deal that promised higher pay and better working conditions, averting a potential strike and allowing operations to return to normal.】

item.title: 监管机构 Ofcom 称，英国人每天观看 YouTube 的时间为 51 分钟
item.description: 监管机构 Ofcom 表示，2025 年，英国人平均每天在智能手机、平板电脑和个人电脑上观看 YouTube 的时间为 51 分钟，并指出，YouTube 所有者 Alphabet 和 Meta 提供的服务占所有上网时间的一半以上。【原文：Britons watched YouTube on average for 51 minutes a day in 2025 on smartphones, tablets and PCs, regulator Ofcom said, noting that services from its owner Alphabet and from Meta account for more than half of all time spent online.】

item.title: 三星 SDI 部门签署价值超过 13.6 亿美元的美国电池交易，用于储能系统
item.description: 韩国三星 SDI 周三表示，其部门三星 SDI 美国公司已经签署了一项协议，将向一家美国客户提供磷酸铁锂（LFP）电池，用于能源储存系统，这引发了该公司股价的大幅上涨。【原文：South Korea's Samsung SDI said on Wednesday that its unit Samsung SDI America has signed a deal to supply lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries to a U.S. customer for energy storage systems, triggering a sharp rally in its shares.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：美国与印度尼西亚的贸易协议面临破裂风险
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引未具名消息人士的话报道称，美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）认为雅加达正在对其做出的几项承诺 "开倒车"，印尼与美国的贸易协议面临崩溃的危险。【原文：Indonesia's trade deal with the United States is in danger of collapsing, with U.S. trade representative Jamieson Greer believing Jakarta is "backtracking" on several commitments it made, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing unnamed sources.】

item.title: MUFG 顶级银行高管称市场对日本的 "负面螺旋 "风险感到焦虑
item.description: 顶级贷款机构三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group）的市场主管表示，市场越来越担心日本陷入负螺旋的 "尾部风险"，即货币紧缩滞后于通胀，日元疲软推高物价。【原文：Markets are increasingly worried about Japan's "tail risk" of slipping into a negative spiral, where monetary tightening lags inflation and a weak yen pushes prices higher, the markets chief at top lender Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group said.】

item.title: 迪士尼提名苹果公司前首席运营官进入董事会
item.description: 迪士尼周二表示，已提名苹果公司前首席运营官杰夫-威廉姆斯（Jeff Williams）为独立董事候选人，参加 2026 年年度股东大会的选举。【原文：Disney said on Tuesday it has nominated former Apple Chief Operating Officer Jeff Williams as an independent director candidate for election at its 2026 annual shareholders' meeting.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表格里尔表示，他对根据非洲贸易倡议 "区别对待 "南非持开放态度
item.description: 美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）周二表示，如果美国延长与撒哈拉以南非洲地区于今年九月到期的贸易倡议，他愿意将南非与其他非洲国家区别对待。【原文：U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer on Tuesday said he was open to treating South Africa differently than other African countries if the U.S. extends a trade initiative with sub-Saharan Africa that expired in September.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，特朗普将于本周启动最后一轮美联储主席面试
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将很快启动美联储主席的最后一轮面试。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will soon launch a final round of interviews for Federal Reserve chair, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 交易日：紧张的美联储守夜即将结束
item.description: 周二，美国股市、债券和美元相对持稳，投资者正在为美联储周三的政策决定做准备，而澳大利亚央行行长出人意料的鹰派言论则震撼了当地市场。【原文：U.S. stocks, bonds and the dollar held relatively steady on Tuesday as investors braced for the Federal Reserve's policy decision on Wednesday, while surprisingly hawkish remarks from Australia's central bank governor rocked markets there.】

item.title: GameStop 季度收入不及预期，数字业务举步维艰
item.description: GameStop 周二公布的第三季度营收低于分析师的预期，这家视频游戏零售商在转向数字下载和流媒体后努力扩大市场份额，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌 5.8%。【原文：GameStop posted third-quarter revenue below analysts' estimates on Tuesday, as the video game retailer struggles to gain ground following its pivot to digital downloads and streaming, sending its shares down 5.8% in after-hours trading.】

item.title: Match Group 表示，Hinge 首席执行官 Justin McLeod 将离职
item.description: 在线约会应用 Hinge 的首席执行官贾斯汀-麦克劳德（Justin McLeod）周二表示，母公司 Match Group 将退出该公司，创办一家名为 Overtone 的独立人工智能企业。【原文：Online dating app Hinge's CEO, Justin McLeod, is stepping away from the company to launch a new standalone AI-driven venture called Overtone, parent company Match Group said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，激进投资者 Jana Partners 推动 Alkami Technology 探索出售事宜
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，激进投资者 Jana Partners 已敦促为银行和信用社提供金融科技服务的 Alkami Technology 探索出售给竞争对手或私募股权公司。【原文：Activist investor Jana Partners has urged Alkami Technology , a fintech provider for banks and credit unions, to explore a sale to a rival or private equity firm, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国银行高管称人工智能将提高生产力、减少工作岗位
item.description: 包括摩根大通和富国银行在内的美国银行表示，人工智能将提高其公司的生产力，并可能导致工作岗位流失。【原文：U.S. banks including JPMorgan Chase and Wells Fargo said artificial intelligence will boost productivity at their companies and likely cause job losses.】

item.title: 贝莱德首席财务官表示，iShares 的年度流入量有望创下历史新高
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）首席财务官马丁-斯莫尔（Martin Small）周二表示，贝莱德的 iShares 产品今年有望实现创纪录的年流入量，并成为有机基础费用增长最强劲的年份之一。【原文：BlackRock is on track for record annual inflows into its iShares products this year and for one of its strongest years for organic base-fee growth, Chief Financial Officer Martin Small said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普政府免除美国航空公司因轮椅问题被罚的 1,670 万美元罚款
item.description: 美国交通部周二表示，将在 2024 年免除对时任总统乔-拜登领导下的美国航空公司开出的 1670 万美元罚单，作为该航空公司对待残疾乘客的和解协议的一部分，其中包括未能为一些残疾乘客提供足够的帮助以及对轮椅处理不当。【原文：The U.S. Transportation Department said Tuesday it will waive $16.7 million in fines issued to American Airlines under then President Joe Biden in 2024 as part of a settlement over the air carrier's treatment of disabled passengers, including failing to provide some with adequate assistance and mishandling wheelchairs.】

item.title: 美国消费者局以资金短缺为由发布 "临时最终 "开放银行规则
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护最高监督机构周二表示，它将发布有关 "开放银行 "和消费者数据权利的临时法规，因为它预计在完成目前正在进行的重写拜登时代法规的程序之前，资金将耗尽。【原文：The top U.S. watchdog agency for consumer financial protection said Tuesday it will issue interim regulations for "open banking" and consumer data rights because it expects to run out of money before completing a process now underway to rewrite Biden-era regulations.】

item.title: 花旗集团首席财务官梅森预计第四季度投资银行业务增长率在 20%左右
item.description: 花旗集团首席财务官马克-梅森（Mark Mason）周二表示，预计第四季度投资银行业务费用将比去年同期增长 20%左右。【原文：Citigroup Chief Financial Officer Mark Mason said on Tuesday that fourth-quarter investment banking fees are expected to be increase by a percentage in the mid 20s compared with a year earlier.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，SpaceX 将于 2026 年进行首次公开募股，融资额将超过 300 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）正在推进首次公开募股计划，该计划将寻求大幅融资300多亿美元，目标估值约为1.5万亿美元。【原文：Elon Musk's SpaceX is moving ahead with plans for an initial public offering that would seek to raise significantly more than $30 billion and target a valuation of about $1.5 trillion, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 礼来拟斥资 60 亿美元在阿拉巴马州建厂，推动美国制造业发展
item.description: 礼来公司周二表示，将投资 60 多亿美元在阿拉巴马州亨茨维尔新建一座活性药物成分生产厂，以扩大美国的生产规模并加强药品供应链。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Tuesday it will invest more than $6 billion in a new active drug ingredient manufacturing facility in Huntsville, Alabama, to expand U.S. production and bolster medicine supply chains.】

item.title: OpenAI 聘用 Slack 首席执行官 Denise Dresser 担任首席营收官
item.description: OpenAI 周二任命 Slack 首席执行官 Denise Dresser 为其首席营收官，因为这家 ChatGPT 制造商希望扩大其企业业务。【原文：OpenAI on Tuesday appointed Slack CEO Denise Dresser as its chief revenue officer, as the ChatGPT maker looks to expand its enterprise business.】

item.title: 甲骨文对 OpenAI 的依赖面临审查，债务推动的人工智能建设引发担忧
item.description: 在甲骨文公司 4000 多亿美元的合同积压点燃股市狂潮几个月后，人们对其依赖 OpenAI 和债务推动的数据中心建设的热情已经让位给了质疑，而这将是甲骨文公司周三财报的主要内容。【原文：Months after Oracle's $400 billion-plus contract backlog ignited a stock-market frenzy, the enthusiasm has given way to doubts about its reliance on OpenAI and debt-fueled datacenter buildout, which will dominate its earnings on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国银行监管机构称银行可充当加密货币中介机构
item.description: 美国国家银行监管机构周二表示，将允许银行充当加密货币交易的中介机构，这是特朗普政府为缩小传统金融部门与加密货币活动之间的差距而采取的最新举措。【原文：Banks will be allowed to act as intermediaries on crypto transactions, a national U.S. bank regulator said on Tuesday, in the latest step by the Trump administration to narrow the gap between the traditional financial sector and crypto activities.】

item.title: 摩根大通预计第四季度投资银行业务收入增长
item.description: 摩根大通消费者和社区银行业务首席执行官玛丽安-莱克（Marianne Lake）周二表示，摩根大通预计第四季度投资银行业务收入将以较低的个位数百分比增长，同时预计第四季度市场业务收入将以较低的十位数百分比增长。【原文：JPMorgan Chase expects investment banking revenue to be up by the low-single digit percentages in the fourth quarter, while it expects markets revenue to be up in the low-teens percentages in the fourth quarter, its consumer and community banking CEO Marianne Lake said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 投资者为美联储长期不和预热
item.description: 预计本周将举行的美联储政策会议将是多年来最富争议性的会议之一，这很可能成为金融市场对 2026 年美国货币政策辩论将如何发展的路演测试。【原文：What is expected to be one of the most ructious Federal Reserve policy meetings in years this week could well prove to be the road test for financial markets on how U.S. monetary policy debates will shape up in 2026.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，壳牌正在就以 30 多亿美元收购 LLOG 勘探公司进行深入谈判
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，壳牌正在就收购 LLOG Exploration Offshore 进行深入谈判，交易价值超过 30 亿美元。【原文：Shell is in advanced talks to buy LLOG Exploration Offshore in a deal worth more than $3 billion, two sources familiar with the matter said, a move that would boost the oil major's upstream portfolio through one of the largest privately held oil and gas producers in the U.S. Gulf.】
